name: textPasteConfigurationSupporting(_:performPasteOf:to:)
desc: Asks the delegate to explicitly handle the final incorporation of a pasted or dropped string of text into the text view.
declaration:
optional func textPasteConfigurationSupporting(_ textPasteConfigurationSupporting: UITextPasteConfigurationSupporting, 
                                performPasteOf attributedString: NSAttributedString, 
                                            to textRange: UITextRange) -> UITextRange
